description: Application for Variation of Condition No. 2 (building in accordance with approved plans) of planning permission granted on the 24th December 2014 Ref: PA/14/00293 for 'Demolition of the existing building and the construction of a new residential building ranging from 6 to 23 storeys (with additional lower ground level) and comprising 134 residential units, private leisure facilities, a new urban square (including new pedestrian links and hard and soft landscaping), revised vehicle access arrangements, and basement car parking and servicing' to increase the height of the building from consented 78m (AOD) to 84.37m (AOD), to allow for an increase 23 storeys to 26 storeys, with an increase from 134 to 155 residential units, plus additional alterations to the ground floor to provide a larger refuse storage area, the introduction of a caf√©, an enlarged basement to accommodate more bicycles and minor amendments to the external landscaping.
